T02TD2992E:55a-0: @55a * // dpal rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2992E:55a-1: gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar bar 'dod na /
T02TD2992E:55a-2: sngon dus dang mtshan nyid shes par bya ste bram ze rgyal rigs kyi mi gzugs bzang ba dang mdzes pa la mar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum dang yar gyi lnga la /
T02TD2992E:55a-3: skyed mos tshal dang 'jig rten pa'i lha rten nam grong gi 'dun sa rnams su 'dzin par byed do //
T02TD2992E:55a-4: zhugs pa'i mtshan ma ni khro ba med pa du ba'ang med /
T02TD2992E:55a-6: gtsang sbra la dga' zhing mig gi tshogs 'khrul pa'o //
T02TD2992E:55a-7: de dag gso ba ni zas sna tshogs pa dang /
T02TD2992E:55a-17: gser la sogs te rin po che sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa'i gtor ma byang phyogs su sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2992E:55a-18: de nas khrus byas te gro dang /
T02TD2992E:55b-0: sgog skya rnams cha bsnyams la @55b mar phul bzhi dang /
T02TD2992E:55b-1: 'o ma phul bzhi dang ba lang gi ko ba phul bzhi dang /
T02TD2992E:55b-2: ra'i chus btags la me chung bas btsos la nad pa rig sngags kyis khrus byas la /
T02TD2992E:55b-3: de dag la sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags la lus la byug / snar ldugs /
T02TD2992E:55b-5: ltor btang bas gnod sbyin gyi gdon las thar bar nges so //
T02TD2992E:55b-6: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa /
T02TD2992E:55b-7: gdon las rnam par thar bar nges pa'i sgrub thabs dam pa rdzogs so//
